title: The Eminence in The Dungeon
text: As anon as thee ent'r the next cubiculo in the dungeon thy immense amount of training and exp'rience maketh thee feeleth tense, thee knoweth yond one of the next cubiculos
inhabits a dang'r yond might beest too most wondrous f'r the h'ro and his apprentice

buttons.text: Sorry i didnt hear it, come again?
The squire sees gold, he is blinded by the tresure, you decide to not stop him. you value his decisions as he is free man.
I feel the immense pressure in the room I must know what it is.
I can feel the harthbeat of the hero, he knows the way.
